left.title: Connect with Pet Lovers Worldwide
left.paragraph: Discover the joy of pet life and share your unique stories with pet lovers around the world. Here, you can enjoy a wonderful life with your pets and discover all kinds of fun and interesting things about them.

right.title: Create Account
right.signinHint: Already have an account? Sign in here.
right.user_min: Username must be at least 5 characters
right.user_max: Username cannot be more than 25 characters
right.vregex: Username can only contain letters and numbers
right.password_min: Password must be at least 6 characters
right.password_regex: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, or 1 number
right.privacy: By clicking Create Account, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
